title: A Defense Of Jealousy?
teaser: On its face, jealousy would seem to be only a destructive emotion--a problem for relationships, a source of stress in the workplace, and more. But Joy Cardin's guest says jealousy is actually helping us. He describes the benefits of jealousy, and why he says it's one of the central drivers of creativity and civilization.
